description:
Many well known entrepreneurs, scientists, & celebrities such as Steve Jobs, Albert Einstein, & Oprah Winfrey have used intuition to help guide them to their goals, their dreams, & their Dream Jobs. This course will explore the phenomenon of intuition. Here is what you will find in this course:

  • an audio clip on intuition from renowned author Shakti Gawain,
  • videos from well known psychiatrist, Dr. Judith Orloff,
  • a recording of the popular intuition meditation in order to help you Discover Your Dream Job,
  • 5 inspirational & interactive exercises that will help you explore the Job of your Dreams.
  • 10 time-tested, dynamic, fun, creative, engaging, and insightful VIDEO TUTORIALS; approximately 80 minutes of information.
  • Communication with other like-minded Dream Job Explorers on Udemy & Facebook,
  • E-mail support from David!
  • Discounts off private coaching sessions with David!
  • Discounts off future courses!

By the end of this course, you will have

  • understood the phenomenon of Intuition,
  • explored why you need Intuition,
  • learned to trust your Intuition,
  • seen a number of people who use Intuition in their lives,
  • developed your Intuition,
  • practiced the daily Intuition Meditation,
  • listened to my story on how trusting my Intuition helped me open 2 restaurants & become a teacher,
  • completed several exercises to determine whether or not you have found your Dream Job
title: Intuition & Your Dream Job
